Red
card.text: [+1]: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put a Pokémon card revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. [−3]: Create Red's Pikachu, a legendary 5/5 white and red electric Pokémon with lifelink, haste, and first strike. [−7]: You may put any number of Pokémon cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Blue
card.text: [+2]: Up to one target Pokémon gets +2/-2 until end of turn. [-2]: Search your library for a Pokémon card. You may cast that card for its evolve cost without paying its mana cost. Then shuffle. [−7]: Pokémon you control get +3/+3 and gain lifelink, indestructible, haste, vigilance, and hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Green
card.text: [+1]: Move all counters from up to one target Pokémon onto up to one other target Pokémon. [-2]: Return an artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. [−5]: Until end of turn, you can cast Pokémon for their Evolve cost without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Brock
card.text: [+1]: Target Pokémon gets +2/+2 until end of turn. [−2]: Until end of turn, Pokémon you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them. [−4]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, put two +1/+1 counters on it."

card.name: Misty
card.text: Whenever you counter a spell, you may draw a card. [-1]: Tap or untap up to one target Pokémon. [−1]: Draw two cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Lt. Surge
card.text: [+1]: Up to 1 target Pokémon gains vigilance and haste until end of turn. [−3]: Pokémon you control with first strike gain double strike until end of turn, then Pokémon you control gain first strike until end of turn. [−6]: Up to 1 target Pokémon gains indestructible until end of turn. Lt. Surge deals 12 damage to each Pokémon.

card.name: Erika
card.text: [+1]: Add {G}, {U}, or {W}. [-2]: Create two 1/1 green and black Grass Poison tokens with lifelink named Oddish. [−X]: Pokémon you control get +X/+X until end of turn.

card.name: Koga
card.text: [+1]: Up to one target Pokémon gains infect until end of turn. [-2]: Put two -1/-1 counters on target Pokémon. You gain life equal to the number of counters on that Pokémon. [−6]: You get an emblem with "Pokémon you control have {B}: this Pokémon gains shadow until end of turn."

card.name: Sabrina
card.text: [+1]: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library. [-2]: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card third from the top. [-4]: Target player discards a card, then each player draws cards equal to the number of cards in their hand.

card.name: Blaine
card.text: [+1]: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. [0]: Up to three target Pokémon get +1/+0 until end of turn. [−3]: You get an emblem with "Medicine cards in your hand have flash."

card.name: Giovanni
card.text: [+1]: Draw a card and you lose 1 life. [-1]: Each player sacrifices a Pokémon or Trainer. [-6]: Search target opponent's library for a Pokémon card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.

card.name: Professor Oak
card.text: [+1]: Until end of turn, Pokémon enter the battlefield with your choice of a lifelink counter or a double strike counter on them. [-3]: Exile target Pokémon with power greater than its toughness. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Pokémon you control have indestructible."

card.name: Lorelei
card.text: [+1]: Target player gains 3 life. [0]: Pokémon you control get +0/+2 until end of turn. [-5]: Put any number of Water and Ice Pokémon cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Bruno
card.text: [+2]: Untap up to two target lands. [-1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Fighting or Rock Pokémon. [-3]: Pokémon you control with +1/+1 counters on them gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Agatha
card.text: [+1]: Exile the top two cards of your library and choose one of them. Until end of turn, you may play that card. [-2]: Destroy target Pokémon. [-X]: Up to X target Pokémon get -0/-X until end of turn.

card.name: Lance
card.text: [+2]: Lance deals 3 damage to target Pokémon. You gain 3 life. [-2]: Until end of turn, Lance becomes a 6/6 Dragon Pokémon with flying and vigilance that's still a Trainer. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. [-8]: Gain control of all Pokémon.

card.name: Bill
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Poké Ball
card.text: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast Pokémon cards exiled this way.

card.name: Great Ball
card.text: Scry 3, then reveal the top card of library. If it’s a Pokémon card, you may put it into your hand.

card.name: Safari Ball
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to one Pokémon card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Ultra Ball
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card with toughness greater than its power, reveal it, and put it into your hand. You gain life equal to the difference between the power and toughness of the revealed card.

card.name: Master Ball
card.text: Search your library for up to three Pokemon cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. You lose life equal to the highest mana value among cards revealed this way.

card.name: Switch
card.text: Return target Pokémon you control to its owner's hand. If you do, put a Pokémon with equal or lesser mana value from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Poké Flute
card.text: Untap all Pokémon you control.

card.name: Old Rod
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card with an evolve activated ability and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Revive
card.text: Return target Pokémon card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Max Revive
card.text: Return target Pokémon card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Energy Search Mk2
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put it on the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle.

card.name: Mysterious Fossil
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card with fossil and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Explore
card.text: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Revitalize
card.text: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Show of Force
card.text: Show of Force deals 1 damage to each Pokémon without flying. Draw a card.

card.name: Investigate
card.text: Scry 2, then draw a card.

card.name: Potion
card.text: Tap target Pokémon. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Lemonade
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Growth
card.text: Shuffle target land you control into your library. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.

card.name: PlusPower
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +2/+2 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: X-Defense
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Guard Spec.
card.text: Target Pokémon gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Antidote
card.text: Remove up to three -1/-1 counters from target Pokémon or up to three poison counters from target player.

card.name: Ice Heal
card.text: Untap target Pokémon. It gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Swords Dance
card.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target Pokémon.

card.name: Forced Adaptation
card.text: Evolve target Pokémon. If you do, it fights target Pokémon.

card.name: Turn to Stone
card.text: Destroy target Pokémon or Trainer.

card.name: Itemfinder
card.text: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Body Slam
card.text: Target Pokémon you control deals damage equal to its power to target Pokémon you don't control. If the Pokémon you control has trample, excess damage is dealt to that Pokémon's controller instead.

card.name: Slash
card.text: Slash deals 4 damage to target Pokémon.

card.name: Whirlwind
card.text: Return target Pokémon to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.

card.name: Sing
card.text: Tap all Pokémon target player controls. Those Pokémon don't untap during that player's next untap step.

card.name: Smog
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on each attacking Pokémon. Each player gets a poison counter.

card.name: String Shot
card.text: All Pokémon lose haste and hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Swift
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent.

card.name: Disable
card.text: Split second Until end of turn, target Pokémon can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Fire Spin
card.text: Fire Spin deals 2 damage to target Pokémon. If that Pokémon would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Gust
card.text: Gust deals 2 damage to target Pokémon with flying. If that Pokémon is attacking, Gust deals 5 damage instead.

card.name: Slam
card.text: Destroy target tapped Pokémon.

card.name: Poison Sting
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target Pokémon. Draw a card.

card.name: Glare
card.text: Target Pokémon can't attack or block this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Flash
card.text: Pokémon get -3/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Toxic
card.text: All Pokémon get -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Reflect
card.text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell.

card.name: Fire Blast
card.text: Fire Blast deals 5 damage to target Pokémon. Overload—Reveal a red Pokémon card from your hand.

card.name: Solar Beam
card.text: Target Pokémon you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Overload—Reveal a green Pokémon card from your hand.

card.name: Hydro Pump
card.text: Put target creature on top of its owner’s library. Overload—Reveal a blue Pokémon card from your hand.

card.name: Rock Throw
card.text: Rock Throw deals 6 damage to target Flying Pokémon or target Pokémon with flying.

card.name: Release
card.text: Counter target Pokémon spell.

card.name: Vine Whip
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Guillotine
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Target Pokémon loses indestructible. Destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Softboiled
card.text: You gain 7 life. Shuffle Softboiled into its owner’s library and draw a card.

card.name: Pilfer
card.text: Exile target Pokémon. If you do, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Mimic
card.text: Copy target non-Pokémon spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Double-Edge
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon. If you do, it fights another target Pokémon.

card.name: Prepare for Trouble
card.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

card.name: Razor Leaf
card.text: Razor Leaf deals X damage to each flying Pokémon and each Pokémon with flying, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on all Pokémon.

card.name: Water Gun
card.text: Return target spell to its owner's hand.

card.name: Petal Dance
card.text: Untap all lands you control. Until end of turn, whenever you tap a land for mana, add two additional mana of any color that land could produce.

card.name: Thunder Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {W}. Thunder Stone deals 1 damage to you. Sacrifice Thunder Stone: Destroy target artifact or TM.

card.name: Leaf Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. Sacrifice Leaf Stone: Add {G}{G}{G}.

card.name: Water Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {U}. Sacrifice Water Stone: Scry 3.

card.name: Fire Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. Sacrifice Fire Stone: Fire Stone deals 2 damage to target Pokémon or trainer.

card.name: Moonstone
card.text: {T}: Add {B} or {W}. You lose 1 life. Sacrifice Moonstone: Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Poké Doll
card.text: Sacrifice Poké Doll: Pokémon can't attack you or trainers you control until end of turn.

card.name: Silph Scope
card.text: All Pokémon lose hexproof, shadow, and unblockable. Damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Ancient Slab
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Pokémon Storage System
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with Pokémon Storage System to your hand, then draw a card.

card.name: Town Map
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Town Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Super Repel
card.text: No more than two Pokémon can attack you each combat.

card.name: Nugget
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Nugget: Add one mana of any color. When Nugget is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Mysterious Feather
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mysterious Feather: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Thunderbolt
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage to a Pokémon, Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to that Pokémon.

card.name: Ice Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage to a Pokémon, tap that Pokémon and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Hyper Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon with no evolve abilities Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Destroy target Pokémon. This Pokémon doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step."

card.name: Focus Energy
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: put a +1/+1 counter on this Pokémon." When enchanted Pokémon has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Focus Energy. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Quick Attack
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Flash Enchanted Pokémon gets +1/+1 and has haste and first strike.

card.name: Barrier
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Another target Pokémon gains indestructible until end of turn."

card.name: Counter
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon is dealt damage by another Pokémon, it deals twice that much damage to that Pokémon.

card.name: Mega Drain
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Pay Day
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Sky Attack
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has flying.

card.name: Dream Eater
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.

card.name: Pewter City Gym
card.text: Pokémon you control enter the battlefield with your choice of an additional +1/+1 counter or +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Cerulean City Gym
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same mana value as the revealed card.

card.name: Vermillion City Gym
card.text: Pokémon you control enter the battlefield with your choice of a first strike counter or a haste counter.

card.name: Celadon City Gym
card.text: If -1/-1 counters would be put on a Pokémon, put twice that many -1/-1 counters instead. When a Pokémon dies, if it had any -1/-1 counters on it, exile it instead of you gain 3 life.

card.name: Saffron City Gym
card.text: Whenever you put cards on the top or bottom of your library, look at the top card of target opponent's library.

card.name: Fuschia City Gym
card.text: Whenever a player loses life for the first time in a turn, that player discards a card.

card.name: Cinnabar City Gym
card.text: Players can cast sorceries as though they had flash.

card.name: Viridian City Gym
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses a color. Until end of turn, lands tapped for mana produce mana of the chosen color instead of any other color.

card.name: S.S. Anne
card.text: Whenever Pokémon fight eachother, they each gain indestructible and lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Pokémon Tower
card.text: If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a Pokémon card, put it on the bottom of your library. Otherwise, draw a card. Whenever a Pokémon is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

card.name: Bill's Grassland
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Grassland. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Bill's Grassland: Add {W} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Volcano
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Volcano. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Bill's Volcano: Add {R} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Rainforest
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Rainforest. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Bill's Rainforest: Add {G} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Marsh
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Marsh. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Bill's Marsh: Add {B} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Coastline
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Coastline. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Bill's Coastline: Add {U} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Celadon City
card.text: Celadon City enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Cerulean Cave
card.text: Cerulean Cave enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Cerulean City
card.text: Cerulean City enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Cinnabar Island
card.text: Cinnabar Island enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Cinnabar Lab
card.text: Cinnabar Lab enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Cycling Road
Diglett’s Cave
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. {2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Diglett’s Cave: Destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Fuchsia City
card.text: Fuchsia City enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Game Corner
card.text: Game Corner enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

Lavender Town
Mt. Moon
card.text: Mt. Moon enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

card.text: {T}: Add {W}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast Pokémon spells.

card.name: Pewter City
card.text: Pewter City enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {G} or {R}.

card.name: Pewter Museum
Pokémon Mansion
card.text: {T}: Add {B}. {4}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Power Plant
card.text: Power Plant enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Rock Tunnel
Safari Zone
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Safari Zone: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Seafoam Islands
card.text: {T}: Add {U}. {T}: Return target Water Pokémon to its owner's hand.

card.name: Silph Co.
Vermillion City
Victory Road
